item.description:
@Tagged_Santa wrote:

@echo off cls echo Santa Restarter.. tskill java /a echo Restarting Server.. title Santa-Scape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls

It’s the one I use, and it works fine for me

item.title: Restarter
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

I have a restarter and this is its code

@Title Corey’s Auto-Restarter
@echo Corey’s Auto-Restarter is Running…
@PING -n 900 coreyscape.no-ip.biz >nul
@echo Closing server
@tskill java
@PING -n 3 coreyscape.no-ip.biz >nul
@echo Starting up server
@PING -n 3 coreyscape.no-ip.biz >nul
@start .\runserver.cmd
@echo .
@Goto end
[/code]
The n 900 is the time and it used to restart every 15 minutes which is 900 seconds. It wasn’t doing it so i changed it to 10 seconds. Now it is doing it about every 2 mintues? Why is the time messed up? If you don’t know atleast could you suggest a better restarter

Read full topic
